Nope, they voted based on hate and greed and NO ONE OWES ANYTHING to another. It is past time to start treating these hateful pukes just like they treat everyone else.
Fuck their feelings,  vibes and ignorance. 
People that vote for nazis are nazis

talk.author: did:plc:4fg5e23al6dmtset5wz4pgjp
talk.utter: Who is "they"? And yeah, we owe each other everything. The way out is solidarity. Indulging our hurt and bitterness will not help us or help each other to survive. DGMW I've had similar fleeting thoughts but this is where I always return to. Evil from ignorance is not the same as evil from knowledge

talk.author: did:plc:q5t33r6yq6otk74i2hhlx57l
talk.utter: Nope. I owe tolerance and mutual support to those that agree and adhere to the basic social contract. I do not owe an untrustworthy,  hateful individual anything.
